arts.ttl: Zesiger chalks up draw with Frankfurt as "step in right direction"
arts.sum: Cedric Zesiger shared his thoughts with the media at full-time.

arts.ttl: "We were really poor on the ball" - Toppmöller critical of performance against Augsburg
arts.sum: Die Adler's head coach reflected on his side's 0-0 draw on Matchday 30.

arts.ttl: Frankfurt and Augsburg inseparable in goalless gridlock
arts.sum: Die Adler made the trip to Bavaria where a spirited Augsburg side were unlucky not to take more from the 0-0 draw.

arts.ttl: Goalkeepers at the fore as Augsburg hold Eintracht Frankfurt in captivating stalemate
arts.sum: The defining moment of the match came in the 70th minute when Knauff rounded Dahmen and looked certain to score, only for Cédric Adrian Zesiger to make a heroic goal-line clearance. Dino Toppmöller's half-time changes transformed the match, with Ansgar Knauff and Jean-Mattéo Bahoya injecting pace and creativity into Frankfurt's attack.

arts.ttl: Tottenham defeat has Eintracht Frankfurt getting philosophical – Long term gains from short-term pain
arts.sum: Eintracht Frankfurt were knocked out of the UEFA Europa League on Thursday night, with Tottenham Hotspur managing to come away with a 2-1 aggregate win over the German side. arts.ttl: Ange Postecoglou explains why 'pivotal' Eintracht Frankfurt triumph can be a turning point for his tenure with Tottenham
arts.sum: MATT BARLOW: 'I'm not everyone's cup of tea, I get that,' said Postecoglou. 'That's fair enough. I don't think anyone is, we all have different views on life and people.

arts.ttl: Eintracht Frankfurt’s Rasmus Kristensen ‘didn’t sleep at all’ after Europa League elimination
arts.sum: Eintracht Frankfurt head coach Dino Toppmöller continued to address the fall out from his side's Europa League elimination at his Friday press conference.

arts.ttl: Eintracht Frankfurt increase price tag on in-demand Ekitike
arts.sum: Eintracht Frankfurt have increased their price tag for Hugo Ekitike to €100m (£85.7m) amid interest from the Premier League. The Bundesliga side had previously valued the Frenchman at around €80m (£68.5m) but have increased their demands amid mounting interest from England. Liverpool have been heavily linked with Ekitike of late, while Chelsea, Arsenal and Manchester […] The post Eintracht Frankfurt increase price tag on in-demand Ekitike first appeared on The Football Faithful.

arts.ttl: Ange Postecoglou gives worrying fitness update on Son Heung-min after Tottenham captain missed Europa League triumph over Eintracht Frankfurt
arts.sum: The South Korean missed last weekend's defeat at Wolves and the Europa League quarter-final victory at Eintracht Frankfurt on Thursday With a foot injury.

arts.ttl: Augsburg vs. Eintracht Frankfurt preview: Eagles look to overcome European disappointment
arts.sum: Eintracht Frankfurt are looking to recover from their recent European disappointment as they travel to an Ausgburg side transformed since the turn of the year.
